entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
